origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_customer_satisfaction_reports', 'description': 'This function retrieves customer satisfaction reports for financial loan companies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial company, e.g., loan, investment.'}, {'name': 'reportCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of reports to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'The list of customer satisfaction reports.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_customer_satisfaction_reports, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyType'是'loan', 'reportCount'是'5'.
